title: How to Make a Tidal Wave Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill the blender with ice cubes, about 1/4 full.
Add all ingredients to the blender.
Place the lid on and blend for a few seconds so all of the ingredients are mixed thoroughly.
Remove the lid and pour the mixture into your glass.

text: Fill the blender with ice cubes, about 1/4 full.  Add all ingredients to the blender.  Place the lid on and blend for a few seconds so all of the ingredients are mixed thoroughly.  Remove the lid and pour the mixture into your glass.  Finished.
